"Usando el Visiphone!":
"El visiphone es una importante herramienta
para los Arks. It would be foolish to leave
it overlooked. If you learn to use it
properly though, you'll really climb
through the ranks!

Pay attention and learn to use it.

Now if you'll excuse me, I have to use
the visiphone myself..."
"ビジフォンのアークスサーチでプレイヤーサーチを実行"
